definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

sentences.english: It is typically favored by large industrial SCR operators.
sentences.chinese: 這是典型的青睞大型工業可控硅運營商。

sentences.english: The low inertia DC drive motor is supplied by a quick thyristor unit.
sentences.chinese: 低慣量的直流傳動電動機由快速可控硅裝置供電。

sentences.english: Perhaps I need to pull apart another SCR and try the arc welding approach.
sentences.chinese: 也許我需要把除了另一可控硅和審判電弧焊接的辦法。

sentences.english: This paper develops a three-phase SCR trigger circuit adopting the cur-rent integrated circuit.
sentences.chinese: 採用通用集成電路設計了一種三相可控硅觸發電路。

sentences.english: The improvement of silicon-controlled trigger circuit.
sentences.chinese: 可控硅觸發電路的改進。

sentences.english: Establish the PFN model of single module.
sentences.chinese: 建立了大功率可控硅的通態模型。

sentences.english: Controlling the conduct angle of the silicon symmetric switch controls the output of the electric current for spot welding.
sentences.chinese: 用控制可控硅導通角來控制焊接電流的輸出。

sentences.english: The SCR controls half of the positive cycle of alternating current applied to it.
sentences.chinese: 可控硅控制的一半施加到其的交流電流的正週期。

sentences.english: This is the high effcient flame cutting equipment controlled by SCR timing.
sentences.chinese: 該機是一種採用可控硅調速的高交效率火焰切割設備。

sentences.english: Exchange the silicon controlled rectifier to control, electromagnetic induction exports.
sentences.chinese: 交流可控硅控制，電磁感應輸出。

sentences.english: Adopting digital control silicon deflector device when AC motor driving.
sentences.chinese: 直流電機驅動採用全數字可控硅變流裝置控制。

definition: abbr. for 光耦合器[guang1 ou3 he2 qi4]
rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
to rectify (alternating current to direct current)
